recipe.title: Two-Bean and Corn Salad
ingredients: 1 15 1/2-ounce can Great Northern beans, rinsed, drained
instructions: Whisk oil, vinegar, and cumin in large bowl to blend. Add remaining ingredients and toss to coat. Season salad with salt and pepper. Let stand at least 1 hour and up to 4 hours, tossing occasionally.
